chapter.title: Administration
chapter.para: This screen is reserved for network administrators or systems librarians : the options available here are not risk free for your database. However here are some features easily accessible.
For more information consult the PMB Administrator's Guide.

sect1.title: Catalogue
sect1.para: Allows the customization of several cataloguing options : media types, status of documents, etc.

sect1.title: Users
sect1.para: Allows user creation, assigning usernames and passwords as well as tabs access privileges.

sect1.title: Tools
sect1.para: This menu in the Administration tab contains maintenance tools for the MySQL database, the database update system used when upgrading to a new PMB version as well as the application parameters.
You will be able to indicate the name of your library, its opening hours, the OPAC operations... by modifying these parameters.
